website_summaries.verdict: A mid-size gas fire table that makes a striking centerpiece for any patio and is durable enough to withstand inclement weather.
pros: Features a powder-coated aluminum frame and wicker exterior for a sturdy, durable base
Includes a decorative glass rock set
Comes with a tempered glass lid insert to cover the fire pit when not in use
cons: Pricier than other tables of a similar size
Some buyers complain of issues with the starter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fireplace that won't light!
customer_reviews.text: We love this fireplace. We got the wind guard and it's absolutely beautiful and works great. We have received so many compliments so why only 2 stars? Well 9 times out of 10 the starter doesn't work! Even done everything but unless we use a starter stick. We find for the price this to be ridiculous. We are not the only ones to have this issue...clearly the company should address this issue!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cool'n in the desert

customer_reviews.title: So nice !
customer_reviews.text: Great Fire table for the price. I just love it. Packaging was great. No damaged or incomplete parts. Easy to assemble. Provides nice ambience and heat. So nice I bought twice. One for the patio and the other for the pergola.
customer_reviews.author: kool keith

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire table! It wasn't hard to put together and we purchased the wind shield and cover. It puts off such a beautiful flame and the rocks look like ice cubes, but they never melt! It does put off some heat, but since the table sits up a bit higher, you only feel the heat if you are standing over the fire table.I bought this mostly for ambience and it fits the bill perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fire table
customer_reviews.text: Four starts because I'm not sure why it's so expensive. Hopefully it's quality materials and will last many years. Other reviews sing its praises so I wanted to show that the cover does fit over the wind deflector but will sag from the rain. I built a small insert to hold the cover up and let the rain run off.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Peter

customer_reviews.title: Best Accent to our Patio
customer_reviews.text: One of the easiest assembly projects ever. Very happy with the quality and size of the Outland Fire Table. We looked at several tables and features, and while this was not the cheapest, it provided all of the options and space we were looking for. If you purchase this, we recommend adding the wind guard. Starting is easy. Push in the knob, hear the gas, turn knob to activate ignition and thats it. And if you want a taller flame, you can adjust the air valve on the neck of the supply tube in the area below the table. Shipping was easy, arriving in only 3 days. We give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Garibaldi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected. Also a lot nicer than I was expecting. Very well put together. Easy assembly. Very well packaged with no damage to any parts.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: This fire table is absolutely awesome! Could not be happier with this purchase. Super easy to put together. All you need is a screw driver and scissors. Easy to put propane bottle in and out. Great looking wicker. Factastic glass top. Great fire and heat. I have it under our 9 foot high awning and it’s perfect. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kandyfreak

customer_reviews.title: Can’t feel the heat
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice looking. The wicker is nice. You really can’t feel the heat. And from day one it never started by itself. We always need to use a lighter to start it
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fire pit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fire pit. Giving 4 stars because the auto starter doesn't ignite well. We need to use another source to light it. Once it is warm and the propane is turned off. If restart it then the auto starter works fine. A very pretty and relaxing flame. Fun to just enjoy the flickering flames or to roast marshmallows. Easy to put together. Be careful when unpacking so the glass top does not fall out.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but just doesn't provide significant heat.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, feels sturdy, is well constructed, and is easy to assemble. The only problem is that is just doesn't provide any significant heat. I wish I would have known that. I really do. At this price I could have purchased 3 Lamp Style outdoor heaters like you see at restaurants. We have to sit right next to it to feel any heat even on absolute maximum. I like it. I just don't love it at all. It's great for a 50-60 degree night. It's mostly useless sub 50 degrees. Nice product. Just not exceptional by any means. I wish they would adjust the maximum burn rate, even if the tanks needed changing more often....
customer_reviews.author: Cold Contagious

customer_reviews.title: Table glass surface exploded and shattered
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW Came home and found the black glass part of this fire pit table exploded and completely shattered. The glass wind guard and glass lid is fine but the black glass table top exploded in tiny pieces all over the patio!
customer_reviews.author: C. Fields

customer_reviews.title: I'm so pleased with this fire table
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this fire table. Easy set up, easy on and off lighting and it looks amazing in the evening. Looked at several tables like this but none could compete and the price is very reasonable. Fast shipping !!!! 😊 Happy buyer
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not very warm!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful unit that is a great addition to all decks, porches, and patios! It looks great with all furniture. That being said it is only 35,000 btu’s... I’m sitting 2 feet from it and I can’t feel any heat coming from it. When you stand up you can feel the warmth. This is definetly a for the looks piece. I assumed that going in but I was really hoping it would have proved me wrong. I live in MN and I was really hoping that on a 65 degree night I could feel the heat from it... but it’s still a great piece!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: I really love this table
customer_reviews.text: I really love this table. It is a nice size and very solid. My only complaint is that the black tempered glass top came with a 3-4" scratch on it. I probably could have sent it back but by the time my husband got it assembled and set up (which is when I noticed it) it was just too much trouble to think of trying to repackage it and send it back. Not to mention we really wanted to use it that night for a party we were throwing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 30,000 versus 50,000 BTUs
customer_reviews.text: This unit is attractive andeasy to put together with either two people or one large and strong person. Be sure you buy the 50,000 BTU unit, the 403 model as opposed to the 401 model with 30,000 BTU issue. We canceled the order on the 401 in favor of the 403. It is a bit more expensive, but,, if you want it to keep you warm on a clear but cold night, go for the same unit, with the 50,000 BTUs.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fire table for us
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the packaging! Very sturdy with styrofoam and box material. Everything fit like a glove. One of the feet was damaged prior to shipment because the box was not damaged. Outland Living customer service was GREAT and shipped a new foot overnight. We have used the table a few times already and enjoy the flame created by the ice glass. Starting is very easy, not need to hold down any buttons, just turn and click and the flame starts. It matches our furniture very nicely too. I looked at about every brand on the market and this one fit our needs the best!
customer_reviews.author: Huskeratheart

customer_reviews.title: A romantic fire on your patio or deck!
customer_reviews.text: This makes for a nice place to gather around with family and friends. In cooler temperatures, we sit on our deck sofa with blankets and this adds a little warmth and ambiance. In warmer temperatures it’s a focal point and pretty to see on your deck or patio. It makes for an instantly romantic setting. It’s like a coffee table positioned in front of our L-shaped outdoor sofa. You can place drinks around the rim. Adding the clear glass surround accessory is a very nice touch. We keep it all covered when not in use. So a cover is another good investment as it should not get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Bride to be

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Doesn't put out as much heat as I would have liked and the flame is hard to see unless it is very dark out but the overall fit and finish is good. I'm posting a bad of AMAZON as price went down the week after I purchased and Amazon wouldn't price match their own prices! Instead wanted me to send the entire thing back (after assembled and used) so they could send me a new one at a lower price. They want to waste my time and a bunch of shipping, and probably a perfectly good fire table because of a bad policy... Not happy..
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Beyond our expectations !!!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new coffee table! The height is perfect for drinks and to relax our feet when we are reading and chillin' in the porch - we were worried if the heating was going to be enough or too much but it is just perfect! We will not need to buy an outdoor heater after all! I don't understand why the other models of this table are 3 more expensive because this one surpassed our expectations in quality and finishing and how easy it was to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design & easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Believe all the positive reviews! This was SO easy to put together. Took 2 50ish year old broads, a glass of wine and 4 Bruno Mars songs from start to finish to put together😉. Lit the first time and looks and feels durable. The plus was replacing our old metal with stone tiles fireplace with this one....no rust! Highly recommend!! Looks so great on our deck at Tablerock Lake.
customer_reviews.author: dana l. armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding design and quality!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I chose this fire pit table after looking extensively at those available on Amazon and elsewhere. It was important that the table have space for the propane tank inside and underneath. I also hoped that the brown color would match our lanai furniture and it does perfectly. The table is sturdy and well-made. The design is excellent for assembly as well as convenient for access to the propane tank. Assembly was easy, the directions were clear, and it went from the box to the porch in about an hour. We especially like the attractive glass top. The self-igniter is a great feature and we love the ambiance and warmth the table adds to our outdoor seating.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinestate

customer_reviews.title: super nice, really good quality
customer_reviews.text: pretty extensive assembly, but very easy. directions easy to follow. i waited because i wanted to install the accessory kit at the same time, and it says to do that. but really, i think i could've installed it after assembling everything. the only thing that is assembled during the process is the tray that holds the cover underneath, and it could've been done after. not as easy, but doable. works great, looks really good, puts off decent heat. but i think it's mainly downwind. i haven't used it on a cold night tho.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Stunningly beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing this for a while now and finally pulled the trigger. It's fabulous!!! I am in love. Definitely read the reviews and do not assemble the table before opening the wind shield instructions!!! Imperative! This fire table is stunning in person. So happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service at Outland Living
customer_reviews.text: Our experience with Outland Customer Service could not be explained in any other word other that Extraordinary. We love our new Fire Table.. I emailed customer service as we could not find any matching chairs for the slate grey wicker. Brenna F quickly responded to our question stating that this was a first for her regarding my question. She took the time to search the web and find us some close matches which ended up being a selection that my wife loved. Brenna also offered to search the warehouse for a sample of the wicker to send to us so we could go to local retailers to match.. OUTSTANDING... Merry Christmas Brenna!
customer_reviews.author: sheldon s mccullough

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy. Expect to Clean it a Lot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine with the optional glass windfence and cover set. Wish I had realized that I'd have to disassemble a portion of the table to install the windfence. Take my advice and don't complete table assembly until putting windfence together and looking at how it install so you don't waste more time than is necessary. To put both together by myself took about two hours. Looks beautiful. Expect to clean it a lot to keep it looking beautiful (gotta love glass). Love the auto spark feature where you just turn the knob and it fires up. This feels and looks like commercial grade. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: PawtyLife

customer_reviews.title: Great product but wrong color sent
customer_reviews.text: The firepit is beautiful, well made and we got the accessories of the wind panel, cover and glass cover and it's all beautiful and works smoothly. My husband put it all together in about 20 minutes with a little confusion about where the rack that holds the glass top goes (underneath) but it all works well. We specifially ordered the slate gray to match our gray furniture, but we received the dark brown firepit. The boxes are so big/heavy and it's such a hassle to return, that we just kept it. It doesn't match our furniture, but we are living with it because in the big scheme of things, it's easier than returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Starter doesn't work, low flame...returning..
customer_reviews.text: If you paid over $600 you would expect the basic ignitor to work but it doesn't. The customer service is ver good and the lady was very helpful and send a new ignitor cable. But unfortunately the new one did not work either. I am sitting there and clicking the ignitor on an average 15 - 16 times to get a flame.. The flame itself is very poor. You have to sit and move your hand close to the pit to get some warmth. It looks good but not worth the money I paid...so I would be returning this in coming days. I would recommend checking out other brands.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nair

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our back patio!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was excellent. It was well-packed and the directions were crystal clear. Be sure to read them thoroughly. If you buy the accessory kit with the wind guard and lid, be sure to read those directions first so you can put the cover holder on before you install the propane tank and glass rocks. I would definitely recommend this product. It worked well right out of the gate and creates an amazing ambiance in our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: BKWitt

customer_reviews.title: Easiest set up EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: From start to finish it took my wife and I 25 minutes to set this up. The directions are well written and easy to follow. We placed each individual glass rock by hand instead of dumping the hole bag straight into the pit. There was quite a bit of tiny glass pieces and glass dust at the bottom of the bag that we did not want to throw into the pit. We weren’t the biggest fans of the glass rocks that came with this table but plan on getting something different soon. But other than that we are super impressed with how beautiful and perfect this table is. Makes a great addition to the rest of our outdoor furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality product built in Canada, not China. Excellent assembly instructions written in Her Majesty's Canadian English, not Chinglish. Recommend also purchasing the glass lid, glass windbreak and cover. A minor item is that the instructions should include clearer direction on installing the brackets for the glass lid whether purchased at the same time as the table or later. Also, removal and re-installation of the front screws for the lid brackets were a bit difficult. Finally, the cover is extremely tight, we hope it loosens up a little after we take it off and re-cover.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table....great quality.
customer_reviews.text: One word, Beautiful. This is a really beautiful table in person. Bought it to make some other espresso color patio furniture. Easy setup, the propane table fits in there without any problem, enough room in there even to store other stuff. The table doesn't provide heat like we were thinking but it is still nice. You can feel the heat, but you have to stand over it...so if you are looking for it as a heater (like those standing ones)..buy that instead. This is an accent table and the fire is for looks mostly, I would say.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions carefully!
customer_reviews.text: Even if they don't seem to make sense at the time. During unboxing of this product, I cut a securement strap before I was apparently supposed to... And the glass top completely shattered... All over my patio. After cleaning up the many shards, I collected myself and realized the glass top would have been pretty ugly anyway. So, I made my own out of a $20 box of porcelain tile from the hardware store. Also, the starter is pretty finicky. The gas comes out and the starter makes a spark, but the spark does not usually ignite the gas and so I typically use a lighter instead. The fire, although not very bright, is very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great fire table
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my outside living area. I love it. It's easy to assemble and seems very sturdy and high quality. It's so easy to turn on and off and the glass rocks look like ice on fire. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: We liked it so much we bought too
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous fire table. We liked it so much we bought too. Outstanding price, wonderful product, gorgeous table. Excellent company. Shipped well, sooner than expected and packaged perfectly. It takes longer than 30 minutes to put together, but not much more than that. My husband did it by himself, so maybe that is why it took a little longer, but well worth putting it together. You will love it! Make sure you do put it together where you want it to go, it can get a bit heavy after it is assembled. I appreciate the other reviews, they helped me a lot. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jewelz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't ignite and doesn't come with glass enclosure.
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with the glass flame enclosure. It says it in the fine print on the pictures showing the glass enclosure. Sells for 89.99 on both amazon and outlandliving.com, however, outland does not charge tax or shipping. (Not avail through prime $9.99 shipping). Also, only ignited 1 out of 4-8 times so you get a pretty big gas light-off when it finally ignites. Called "customer service" . Arrogant and rude insisting the igniter is working fine. She stated it should ignite within 1-3 attempts. It takes much more than that. After over 30 minutes on the phone of arguing and counting the positive spark percentages of less than 10%, they agreed to send a new ignition cable.

customer_reviews.title: Outland has outdone itself in designing and building a beautiful fire table.
customer_reviews.text: I did a great deal of research over the last year to find the best and most economical fire table available. I finally settled on the Outland Living Series 401. Once it was delivered, it only took me about an hour to put it together using the extremely thorough instructions. We were enjoying the table shortly afterward. We made a great choice, the table is well built and beautiful. We bought the glass guard that goes around the fire portion and that is also beautiful and well built. You can't go wrong with this purchase. I would encourage that if you are interested in a fire table, look no further than this one, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John Stuelke

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, trouble lighting though.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product, mine doesn't light well however which is a bit embarrassing when I have guests over.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Just finished assembling and wanted to leave an assembly tip. I left the top/glass strapped together in the box, assembled the legs and crossbars to the top, then I was able to tilt it up and out of the box myself without assistance. The glass remained securely strapped in place. Then after installing the bottom shelf and sides, I cut off the straps. Voila. Had a little trouble attaching the long side panels, one panel didn't fit well, so I just tried switching the panels and they fit perfectly. Can't wait to try it out now. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: CaptNemo

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product
customer_reviews.text: Similar models at the local outdoor store in New England are 2100-3000 dollars. So for the price, beautiful. The light colored glass rocks occasionally get suet on them but it wipes right off. We will switch to a colored glass next year. Lid holder SHOULD have come installed as we order at the same time but it arrived later and was a pain to install as after thought. Overall--BEAUTIFUL..
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Just good , thats it
customer_reviews.text: The wife really wanted this one for our gazebo. First-year it was great, but it didn't always light all the time, no big deal. Keep lighter handy. Ive not a huge an of the broken large glass, its not perfectly clear without washing them all the time. Might switch to lava rock or something else. This summer the switch seems to leak propane, most of the turn off bottle after use but its just annoying. This baby does suck down propane though. Say one night 7-11pm on med will use a half a 5lb bottle. Males some heat, but this is not a fire pit. But the kids do love to roast marshmallows and it really easy for that.
customer_reviews.author: mike tolliver

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Table
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and arrived much earlier than expected. Table is well packed and all contents of the table and accessory kit were in excellent condition. Instructions are clear, but I cut the ties that hold the glass before I realized that you should wait. If you do that you just need to be careful and remove the glass top before continuing assembly and re-install it at the end. Assembly time is less that 30 minutes. My spark ignition worked fine. You do need to pull back the connector cover to ensure it is plugged in. Great quality and well worth the price. The 5 star ratings are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Rubicon

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction and wide enough to be really useful table
customer_reviews.text: We love this very well made fire table. The table is wide enough for a plate of food and/or a drink. We purchased this one because of the quality of construction and the size of the table. We've had no issues at all with it. It was easy for one person to assemble, which took about 30 minutes. We added more glass fire beads and the optional glass Wind Guard and cover. All our guests love gathering around this cozy table in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Guruka S. Khalsa

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Online ordering isn't always for me, especially when you can't see or touch an item. The quality of the pit surpassed my expectations. It is well constructed. They give you the appropriate amount of broken glass for the fire pit to be filled. Instructions are written well and assembly was simple. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N

customer_reviews.title: its better than what they advertised
customer_reviews.text: i can't say enough good comments about this fire pit, its better than what they said, from the packing all the way to the finished product, i saw a similar product advertised for 1800.00 and it was not as nice, there pricing is way under what it should be for this high a quality, you will be very happy with the high quality of this item, i also purchased the glass surround it also is very high quality, if i could i would give this company a 10 star rating, my wife loves the looks and the quality, very easy to put together , thank you
customer_reviews.author: les Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table, well made & delivery quickly. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table - matches my Sirio patio furniture exactly. Assembly was very easy even with my young boys 'helping' me. Be sure to follow directions and you will be fine. Table feels very sturdy, looks great as we get lots of compliments. I wish it put out more heat, but I'm not sure if that's just how fire tables are as this is my first. Overall I would recommend this to my friends and family. The quality is great and it functions beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: boogie

customer_reviews.title: ... for quite some time and this one is almost perfect. Well packaged and very simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: Been searching for the right fire table for quite some time and this one is almost perfect. Well packaged and very simple to put together, but the quality was much more than I expected for the price point. My only complaint is that the starter is very touchy. The instructions explain to turn the dial very slowly, but I have not yet found the exact sweet spot on how slow to turn the dial. Even without the glass rock in, it's hard to start. Hopefully I'll find the exact speed in which to turn the dial, but for the price and quality, I don't mind using a lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Roy D. Schnell

customer_reviews.title: Eligant design
customer_reviews.text: The product design is amazing, opened it and used for the first time. I thought it would not be that sturdy, but frankly it is very sturdy than i thought. Assembly was very easy, 10-15 minutes. Do not use power screw drive. Do it with manual screw driver as the philp nut can wear off easily. Important, the glass on the top is not attached to the table, so be very careful. We thought the glass was attached and try to rotate the table to bring it outside, the glass fell down. But the Glass was very sturdy and did not break. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jayendranath Krishnaoomrthy

customer_reviews.title: Great fire table, great accessory bundle
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fire table! We bought it for the shape and pristine look, which is just as good here as it looks on the website. Definitely get the add-ons with it. They really should just lump the 2 together and add an extra $150 or $200 or whatever. Pretty easy to assemble...heavy...looks great...propane fire...what's not to love
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Firepit Table
customer_reviews.text: Blown away by this firepit. Price is phenomenal for such a well designed beautiful firepit. All my guests love it. Nothing better than enjoying adult beverages with the fire going on a beautiful evening. Only downside is that the auto ignitor works once every 20 times so I use a firestick, not a deal breaker. Definitely spend extra and get the cover/glass top/windbreaker kit. Very happy customer! The design and quality is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed and made
customer_reviews.text: I had been eyeing this table for over an year - finally decided to pull the trigger when it went on sale. The table is beautifully made and the instructions are well laid out. FOLLOW their instructions to the T and you'll have it assembled in about 30 mins. Took a couple of tries to fire it up but once it was lit, subsequent attempt to light up went without a hitch. The included glass is just okay. If you want to add more color to the setting, get some colored glass also available on Amazon. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mufasa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Outland Living Fire Pit Table... My new Favorite Backyard Furniture Piece!
customer_reviews.text: This table is extremely well designed and built. You do need to follow the instructions but if you do it will be a painless process. You can tell they put some real effort into product and it shows. It's my favorite part of my backyard oasis. And as a cherry on top, their customer service is AMAZING. They answer quickly, they are responsive and friendly. 6 stars for that! I liked it so much I splurged and added the add-on accessory kit. It's very nice without it but perfect with. Love that the glass cover fits over the wind barrier to give the table a even more high end finished look. Highly recommended for your backyard!
customer_reviews.author: H. Mallia

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love my fire table!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to splurge and get a fire table for the back yard, especially since I have been spending so much more time at home with all of the closures. This fire table is amazing and is of very high quality. I was planning on buying a less expensive model but then read the reviews about the quality of this table and was glad I purchased this one. Very easy to assemble as well. I also bought the wind shield, glass lid, and cover and I love those as well. My daughter makes s'mores over the flame, too. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wright

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table that works great!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this fire table a few months ago and love it. Assembly was very easy. It took us about 30 minutes and it looks great. We have not had any issues with ignition that others have commented about. The materials appear to be very high quality. It looks like it should be much more expensive than $499. I would highly recommend purchasing the windshield and the cover. The cover fits VERY tightly. It took us almost as long to figure out how to put the cover on as it did to assemble the table. The best way we have found is to line up two corners of one of long sides of the table and then pull it across.
customer_reviews.author: Julie 5

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful couch height fire pit but buyer be aware
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit is beautiful with the glass insert (did not come with it...I bought separate from the company and it came weeks before the fire pit). After I bought it my item said there was a scratch on the top. I was not thrilled to find that out after purchase but I thought I'd see what it looked like. I found the scratch, but I was NEVER informed that the panel that latches where the gas tank is housed does not latch so we had to 'jerry rig' it to stay up. I am disappointed about that, but otherwise it is a lovely item.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B

customer_reviews.title: Hard to light!
customer_reviews.text: This product looks beautiful, and if you finally get it lit, it is very nice. When I go to light it, I can smell gas, see the spark, but it will not light. Takes an act of congress. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: So far the table has worked pretty good. As far as assembly goes, it was very easy and smooth for 1 person. The gasoline connection wasn't clear but it worked out. The table does not throw heat and is more about the ambience and cool lighted rocks. All in, very sturdy and good quality. I think it will get 2-3 good years out of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W

customer_reviews.title: Outland Living Fire Table
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Fire Table from Outland Living! But it has let us down a couple times. After the first few uses, it is very reluctant to ignite; sometimes it works first try, other times you can try 4-5 times with no luck. At that point you have to wait a while to let things "purge" (I suppose this means excess gas build-up) before trying again. Now when it doesn't ignite on the first or second attempt, I just use a gas lighter I keep nearby. I am still awaiting an email reply to my questions about this situation. When it is in use, it is absolutely wonderful to sit around on the cooler evenings on our patio.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Augeri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely beautiful. Very well-made, sturdy, and easy to assemble. I was worried about lighting it, but this one is so easy. My friends were very impressed with it. The rocks are very impressive too. I ordered the wind protector and glass cover too, and am so pleased. The shelf inside the unit is so convenient to store the glass top while the fire is on. This table has it all. Elegant. I am ordering the cover to protect it this winter. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Totaly Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We loved that the product was very easy to assemble, it was exactly like the picture presented it to be, it worked perfectly and was absolutely beautiful when lit. We now enjoy being out on our patio even more because its so easy to turn on and watching the flames takes all your daily stress away!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Superb firepit and glass wind guard as well as glass cover. Bad Plastic cover.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design, coffee table height unlike other taller and more expensive store bought designs. Assembly was easy. The starter and preassembly of the connector shows very high quality workmanship. It is a beautiful addition to the patio furniture set. Recommend getting the glass wind guard and firepit top that fits perfectly with the tempered glass top. Do not buy the plastic cover! It’s so tight it is hard to put on and impossible to take off.
customer_reviews.author: MoreCoffee

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to assemble, follow the instructions. Where the igniter is better do not cover with small stones, 2-3 large ones are better. This table is big enough so the one could also eat and have plates on the sides. A perfect match to my Rattan seating which I bought from Hayneedle.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: No covers
customer_reviews.text: Item is well built and looks nice, better quality than the big box store stuff. I do not recommend changing to 1/4" crushed glass. If you want to change the glass go to 1/2"-3/4" to avoid ignition issues. Disappointed that the covers and wind guard are not yet available. I would improve my rating if they were, but at this price they really should be included or at least available.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Really nice fire table
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, it is heavy and sturdy, so feels safe. I had a slight problem with a bit of damage to glass. I contacted their customer service dept and had a prompt reply and they were very helpful, and friendly. Christine, has quickly arranged a new glass replacement, so it should arrive anytime now. Looks fab when lit, fairly easy to put together, my neighbor now wants to order one. I ordered some blue glass just to change it up a bit. It comes with plenty of glass chipping.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret J. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Love this fire table
customer_reviews.text: Just got this Outland fire table and it is great! About 30 minutes of easy assembly with excellent directions. Had the neighbors over on a chilly 40 degree night and the table was the MVP of the night. Great look and took the bite out of the air. If you get the cover it's a little tricky because it's so snug but I'm getting better at the on and off. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Great table!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this fire pit table and are so happy to have it. The quality is great, the assembly was not bad at all, the packaging was so thoughtful and secure, we just love this new addition to our patio so much. Thank you for making such a great product! We bought the glass insert to go with it and we really like that as well. It’s perfect for breezy evenings but it also adds to the ambience and sparkles.
customer_reviews.author: S. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Nicest fire table we've had
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the nicest fire table we have had. We purchased it in 2017 and are about to buy a second one. The ceramic top is beautiful and cleans easily. It is a little challenging to get the propane tank underneath the table due to the weight of the tank and the tight space. Also, the automatic starter only works occasionally, but you can just light it with clicker. But, it still works perfectly after three years. Finally, it doesn't put out a lot of heat, which is fine for us. If it is cold enough to need the heat, it is too cold to sit outside!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: the best fire pit table i have seen beautiful and elegant everyone loves it
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful easy assembly works like a charm matches my patio furniture perfect. Update::: i see alot of people leaving negative reviews because it doesn’t start right away my wife has the same issue because she turns and clicks the clicker without giving the gas time to reach the fire tube to avoid that i turn the knob right before it clicks for like two seconds then click it and starts right up its not the tables fault the gas needs to travel up .
customer_reviews.author: Armando B.

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions, well designed, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are great! I had it together in a short time, but paused to order and install the glass cover and wind screen accessory. One thing I really appreciated was that they included an extra screw of each type in case one was lost. I didn't need them but if I had lost one, or the package was missing, it would have been tough to get a replacement. As of this moment I have not yet fired it up, but will do so soon.
customer_reviews.author: GraniteDon

customer_reviews.title: looks nice
customer_reviews.text: it is a nice looking unit, but expensive for what you get ... it is hard to move it because of the way the tank is placed under the unit and this is flimsy in my estimation ... also to get at the tank to replace or shut off the LP tank you have to remove the whole wall of the unit ... I would think the tank could have been on a rolling frame and the side/door to get at the tank could have been hinged.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not provide comfortable heat
customer_reviews.text: First this thing is very good-looking and extremely easy to assemble. Second it does not provide any heat. I read all the reviews before purchasing this and lots of them said it provided lots of heat. I am now sitting on my patio and it is 56° outside. I am literally 2 feet from it and feel barely nothing with it on high. Do not buy this if you are looking for warmth from it. Definitely buy it if you are looking for aesthetics only.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Larsen

customer_reviews.title: High quality product. It should last many years.
customer_reviews.text: Having had some recent Amazon "misses" this was a pleasant surprise. Packaging was thoughtful (and actually humorous. Assembly was easy, with only one or two decisions that could be confusing. Hardware is stainless and the fittings are very solid. All of the materials are of high quality. It took about 20 minutes to unpack and assemble. We hooked up a tank and it fired right up.
customer_reviews.author: MomentuMan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Put the product together last week and noticed slight manufacturing defect with table top. Did not affect function, use or look, but mentioned it to the manufacturer and they promptly sent a replacement top w/ no questions asked. Things aren't always perfect, but good to know when a manufacturer stands behind their products and ensures customers are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher King

customer_reviews.title: Great Firepit
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice fire pit the quality is good too. The only thing that I did not like is that the glass piece to cover the actual fire pit is extra expense. So you can not use it as a table until you purchase that piece and it is always on back order
customer_reviews.author: Launda Milner

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This great quality piece went together easily (so my husband and son said!) and looks great with my ‘wicker’ seating group although not an exact match in color/weave. Our evening temps are mild (winter in Phoenix) and this gives off enough heat and ambiance to keep it comfy while enjoying cocktails and conversation. I wish the accessory items weren’t so expensive - I think the plate to cover the flame area should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and buy this product. I shopped extensively before buying this table and the reviews from others similar to this where not exactly satisfactory. I paid a little extra and am so satisfied I did. We love it, it’s very easy to put together, the instructions were in English, not Chinese English. It’s well made and very sturdy. Started right up with no problems. We also purchased the kit with wind break. It’s also well worth the price. We will enjoy this for every season.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great fire table-  in grey color
customer_reviews.text: Love this fire table- I just assembled it and the directions were clear and easy to follow. I did order the accessory kit with windscreen, top and cover and waited till it arrived to assemble —as the table has to be flipped upside down to install the bracket for holding the glass cover (although you could probably crawl under and install but would be a bit tough). I posted a pic of the grey color for reference. I did a ton of research on tables and am super pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: kitty lee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful glass fire pit table
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases from Amazon. The fire table was very easy to set up, and looks beautiful at night. I ordered the 3 PC glass wind guard, with glass top. It is so great to go out for an hour to just turn on the propane, and then turn off when your done. No mess and no smelling of smoke! A great purchase, and my hubby continues to tell me how much he loves this fire pit table. We ordered the blue glass pieces for the fire pit, but they come with clear glass pieces.
customer_reviews.author: lbeeba

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be well made and well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: The fire pit table showed up earlier then expected. Can't say enough about how well made; how well packaged; and how easy the directions were to follow in order to assemble the table. I also bought the wind screen and same comments go for it! Everything works great. This was a 10 out of 10 experience and I recommend this company and their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fire Table!
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely nothing I dislike about my Outland Fire Table. Delivery was quick, and assembly was easier than I expected, taking a little less than a half hour to assemble. I love the convenience of the auto ignition and the beauty of the dancing flames over the two-tone blue glass I chose for in the pit. This Fire Table has definitely added class to my patio/deck. I give a high reccommendation to anyone in the market for a Fire Table.
customer_reviews.author: Marie U. Plotke

customer_reviews.title: Read assembly instructions without cutting straps first!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fire pit! We’ve had it now for about a month and no issues except the side panels weren’t flush on both sides and about one inch shorter on each side panels. Easy assembly and took about 1-1/2 hours for my husband to assemble. Note: Don’t cut the orange straps when you open the boxes! Read all papers on top. The igniter doesn’t work sometimes but most of the time if you keep on turning the knob it will. I moved the glass stones away from it and seems to work better. A beautiful conversation piece on our patio and puts out enough heat on a patio for us in Georgia.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Miller

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far
customer_reviews.text: We love it so far , gives off nice heat but the rocks are already turning black (only a few ) on the 2nd use !!is this normal ? Follow up: AMAZING customer service. - they educated us on this issue; sent the parts we needed and everything is perfect. We LOVE this fire table and this company that stand behind their product
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Believe the 5 star reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Believe the 5 star reviews. I only write reviews if product is really good or really bad. This is a great product in every way. Well packaged. Easy to put together (took 1/2 hour), solid construction, built to last, looks great, works great. I love it. Kudos to the manufacturer and to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Alex111

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Fire Table
customer_reviews.text: Great Fire Table Took about 25 minutes to put it together. (no direction included) Love the look, I purchased the glass lid, it makes the table functional as a table and when you are ready for the fire just pick it up and start it up. We used it as a table, that held 6 large pizza's and then pulled the glass lid off when we finished and started the fire up. Guest loved. More for looks than heat.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great after 2 moves. I have had some issues with starter using the ignition. But once I started turning off the bottle after each use, the problem went away. I’m not sure what that has to do with the ignition but it works. You definitely need the glass to block the wind. My only complaint is the glass should come with this product and not and extra. I had to wait a couple days after I received the fire pit to be able to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B Marston

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this, as well as the three piece accessory kit. We've used it for a couple of weeks now, and we couldn't be happier with our purchase! At nighttime, the flame is mesmerizing and puts out a fair amount of heat. I believe this fire pit will extend our "back porch" time greatly. It's now mid- October and the evenings are getting pretty chill. We couldn't sit out, comfortably without it! We do highly recommend also getting at least the glass flame guard and glass cover. It does help the flame when it gets a little breezy and the lid keeps leaves, bugs, etc out when it's not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Zumaqueen

customer_reviews.title: Waited we used it several times
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed the ambiance of this fire pit. Once assembled it pretty much ignites like our gas grill. We did notice it is more difficult to turn on when there is condensation or moisture so we try to keep the cover on it. We did purchase the wind guard and cover to protect it from the elements. In our opinion it is best to follow the directions on assembly and not charge into it with reading everything so you don’t break the glass top and make all the connections correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M. Teer Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and excellent quality fire table.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this fire table, great quality, easy to set up. We purchased the extra accessories kit, which gives it a cover, a wind guard and a glass lid to close off the fire area when not being used. The cover is a bit tricky to put on and take off, but it covers great and even has heat resistant lining and breathing ports...so it is likely to protect the table very well.
customer_reviews.author: paulmbrandt

customer_reviews.title: Attractive patio fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Two people can assemble this item in 30 minutes or less. The fit and finish are very good. The instructions are clear and easy to follow. The table is attractive, and it produces substantial heat. I recommend the wind fence, to protect contact with the hot glass stones. Other than buying a 20# tank of propane, everything you need it included.
customer_reviews.author: L. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, easy to assemble, good quality. Very happy with it. My only comment is that the lid doesn't sit stable on top of the wind fence, it is not secured, but works well directly on table. So we need to remove the wind fence when firepit not in use. But I still feel it deserves a 5. They did a great job for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jagger

customer_reviews.title: Glass with deep scratch
customer_reviews.text: I love the fireplace but for the price I’d expect at least a cover! The reason for this review is because I just received it today and assembled it just now. I noticed the top glass has a deep scratch and I am unable to get the top part replaced and or in contact with anybody! It would be a hassle to have to put it together in the box again to return when all I need is the top glass replaced
customer_reviews.author: Lorenahss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fire table
customer_reviews.text: beautiful and elegant. matches out existing wicker furniture. Have gotten multiple compliments and have yet to see anything comparable at this price point. Perfect for cold nights or a little smores action
customer_reviews.author: walshmiester

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the patio!
customer_reviews.text: The table is beautiful, we use it almost every night. It gives off a good deal of heat. One of the knocks was the ignitor, but ours, when following instructions has worked every time. Very simple assembly and instructions, complete with emojis. What's not to like about that! Also shipped with free box of air in the package! Would recommend to anyone wanting to own a fire table. A bit pricey when adding the glass should and cover which will be at another time but seems to be very well built and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great for the deck!
customer_reviews.text: This is very attractive and well made. My only complaint is- I wish it put out more heat. 50k btu would be better. I live in the NE. So hotter is better but if you live in a warmer climate this would not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Pluggy68

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice unit. Bigger than I expected but a perfect size for our patio. Packed well. You really need two people to unpack. Easy to put together. Wish it had a sliding unit for the propane tank, it would make it easier to connect/disconnect. I gave it 4 stars only because we haven’t lit the fire yet. Will update once we have used it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Mary4512

customer_reviews.title: We used our fire table all summer and we love it. Take the cover off
customer_reviews.text: We used our fire table all summer and we love it. Take the cover off, turn on the propane, twist the dial and instant fire. It definitely beats our old fire pit where by the time we got the fire going, we were ready to call it a night. The table seems well built and should last quite a while. We have the cover, wind guard and the glass screen and we are happy with all the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: F4

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value - Sturdy firetable
customer_reviews.text: Overall we are really happy with this firepit/table. It looks great and is really sturdy. We added the windshield, extra glass and cover and it is a really great look for the price. The assembly was not too bad, but read the instructions before you cut any of the plastic strips!! Other than that it is doable for one person in about 30 minutes or so. In operation, the fire looks great and gives off a decent amount of heat. The piezo lighter is crap. We just use one of those cheap candle lighter things instead, but I would have expected the igniter system to be better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Best for your money
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Great quality, looks very high end and puts off good heat but also low setting if you just want the ambiance. We purchased the glass surround and top. The top doesn't fit great. We also opted to buy a canvas cover to keep our investment nice for years to come. Highly recommended fire table
customer_reviews.author: Brandon/Heather

customer_reviews.title: Ignitor issues but still worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Table is nice, but ignitor worked for a few times, had to take apart, reattach and clean area, worked a few more times then had a very big fire burst upon igniting. We unattached the ignitor and just light it manually now. We have friends with 2 other types of fire tables and the ignitors on all of them are the same and they have to light manually as well. Guess you get what you pay for. It works though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: This all arrived in one big box, was easy to assemble and is well built. It is rare that this combo is what you get now, but this company sells a good product and it was assembled in roughly 10-15 minutes. It was literally a matter of inserting some screws and done. I do not know how one could be not happy with this purchase. It fired up and worked the first time. Nice job by Outland Living!
customer_reviews.author: H. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Such a perfect centerpiece to any outdoor setting. This is well made, beautiful, classy and very well thought out. The specs between the edges and the actual fire pit are big so you can easily put drinks and small plates on the table with the pit open. We purchased the accessory kit which isn’t necessary but makes the table even more usable. I love that the sides stick out further than the base, providing more leg room. It’s my favorite piece of outdoor furniture.
customer_reviews.author: CTen

product_meta.title: Outland Living 410 Series - 36-Inch Outdoor Propane Gas Fire Table, Espresso Brown/Square
product_meta.description:
Color:Espresso Brown/SquareEnjoy the elegance and warmth of the 42,5000 BTU high quality propane fire pit table in any outdoor living space all year round. Admire the reflection of the dancing flames on the Arctic Ice fire glass and black tempered glass tabletop while keeping warm and cozy within the heating radius of this impressive outdoor centerpiece. Durable Outland Living quality construction ensures product longevity; aluminum frame and resin wicker are both weather and rust resistant. Sit back, relax and enjoy time together with family and friends with the perfect propane fire pit table addition to the backyard, patio, deck, or poolside.

Features:
Propane fire pit table with auto-ignition conveniently conceals a standard 20-Lb propane tank (not included) within its base.
Easily access the interior compartment to switch out the propane tank on either side through user friendly access doors with chrome pull rings.
The espresso brown resin wicker base compliments other patio furniture and accessories to offer a unified high end outdoor living space.

Warranty Information:
All Outland Living products include a One Year Manufacturer's Limited Warranty and our knowledgeable and friendly customer service support.
We are committed to your satisfaction and strive to ensure that you thoroughly enjoy your Outland Living product.

Accessories Now Available Separately:
UV & Water Resistant Black Durable Cover
8 mm Tempered Clear Glass Lid insert
8 mm Tempered Clear Glass Wind Fence guard
Save $20 over purchasing each accessory separately with the 3 Piece Square Accessory Set!
NEW Natural Gas Conversion Kit 788 for Outland Series 410 36-Inch Square Fire Tables with 42,500 BTU only
feature_bullets: ✓ IMPRESSIVE OUTDOOR CENTERPIECE: perfect addition of functionality and style for your backyard patio fire pits. This stunning square fire table creates a truly unique fire feature that perfectly compliments any outdoor space that will draw the attention of your family and guests.

✓ DURABILITY & QUALITY - impressive strength and durability, low maintenance, and resistance to heat. The coffee colored UV HDPE (Ultraviolet Light High Density Polyethylene) wicker is a reliable all weather resistant material that will last. Meanwhile our powder-coated aluminum frame construction offers a strong and sturdy base.

✓ CONVENIENCE FEATURES - table dimensions: L 36” x W 36” x H 24.5”. Unit includes pre-attached 3-Ft hose with regulator, 8 mm black tempered glass tabletop and 15.5 lb Arctic Ice decorative glass rock set. Sit back and admire the reflection of the dancing flames while keeping warm and cozy within the heating radius of this impressive outdoor centerpiece.

✓ SAFE & CSA APPROVED - stainless steel burner with highest safety standards is rated 42,500 BTU for terrific flame presence while the push button spark ignition system provides simple and convenient control when lighting. Chrome manual control valve allows 100% smoke free variable flame height. Easy and simple access to interior storage of standard 20-Lb propane tank (not included).

✓ SIGNATURE OUTLAND LIVING QUALITY - at Outland Living we stand behind our high quality outdoor products. If you require any assistance our friendly and knowledgeable customer support will make sure to make it right!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,698 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
